ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We make the Signs clear so that hopefully they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That is how We explain Our signs distinctly so that they may come back (to the right path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: And thus do We expound the signs that they may turn back (to the right path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus do We explain Our revelations so that they might return to (the right path).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And this is how We explain the verses in different ways, and so that they may return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus do We explain the Ayat in detail, so that they may turn (unto the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And thus do We make clear the communications, and that haply they might return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So We distinguish the signs; and haply they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus we detail the revelations, that haply they may return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We explain Our signs in detail thus, so that perhaps they may return to Us.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And Thus We detail the revelations, that haply they may return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Thus do We elaborate the signs, so that they may come back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus do We explain the signs in detail; and perchance they may turn (unto Us).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus do We explain the Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) in detail, so that they may turn (unto the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: As such We make plain Our verses in order that they return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: We thus elaborate the revelations, so that they may return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And thus do We [explain in] detail the verses, and perhaps they will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:174] Thus We detail the signs, We explain them even as We have explained the covenant, that they might reflect on them, and that they might revert, from their disbelief.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus We detail Our revelations) We explain in the Qur'an the story of the Covenant, (that haply they may return) from disbelief and idolatry to the initial Covenant.
